wiki.content:
Me And Bobby McGee was Joplin's only top 10 hit. This was written by Kris Kristofferson, who has written hundreds of songs for a wide variety of artists. He has also recorded many songs and appeared in several movies. He and Joplin had a brief affair. 
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: Me And Bobby McGee was Joplin's only top 10 hit. This was written by Kris Kristofferson, who has written hundreds of songs for a wide variety of artists. He has also recorded many songs and appeared in several movies. He and Joplin had a brief affair.

track.name: Me And Bobby McGee
comments: i just love her raspy voice, its just heaven. todays female vocalist would kill to have that kind of voice.
Janis
I remembered dolly parton when I heart her first.
He sure made a big hit from a song that Kris Krisotfferson wrote & what a great voice she had.
one great vocalist, such a gifted soul.
Love it !
made his song hers
Love her!
That sweet sound which always brings the bitter thoughts of "What if - what if she had lived?" Bittersweet indeed.
Gone to soon! LOL She died in 1971! If she did not die then she would've died in the 80's for sure! LOL
Uwielbiam jej głos, piękny! <3

What a voice!

Sweet Pearl ♥
Kristofferson was really good at writing songs and then having other people perform them better than him.
the great Janis Joplin~i saw her live in'68before shipping off to Thailand.what memories
thats good enough for me.alot of feeling there
a sweet sound
One of the best who left us way to soon!!!!!!!!!!!!
A beautiful free spirit gone too soon.

Great song, great definition of the word "freedom"!
